HOME.TITLE: Hello,
HOME.DESCRIPTION: I'm currently freelancing for a StartUp, focusing on development, debugging, testing and layout. I have good skills in HTML5, CSS3, TypeScript and JavaScript, as well as experience with Bootstrap and Node.js. I stand out for my analytical skills and my commitment to innovative solutions.
